outputs.output_descr:
The project aims at promoting sustainable harvesting of medicinal and aromatic plants through:
- the identification and establishment of appropriate collection methods ensuring a viable long-term supply of raw materials of globally significant MAP species.
- Value-added processing and product improvement result in increased value of globally significant MAPs harvested in biodiversity-friendly manner.
- Supply chain framework strengthened for sustainable harvest of globally significant MAP species and awareness promoted for conservation-friendly MAP products.

project_descr: Mainstreaming Biodiversity Management into Medicinal and Aromatic Plants Production Processes
